    Black Aracnia left Darkmouse and Quickstrike to talk. She knew they 
missed each other, and he took her death very hard. But, now that the alarm 
was screaming it ment the ship was under attack, agian!
    She entered the bridge, and on the main viewscreen saw Atma cleaning the 
hull with some neanderthalic bots. Intersting....
    "Paralysis, Thunder Hammer! Get outside and help Atma! Im going to 
initiate base defences and will join you." She commaded, taking the command 
chair and grabbing the key board.
    
    Paralysis nodded to Black Aracnia's command and looked to Decadel. He 
took out his pistol and loaded it. "So, are you ready for your first fight?"

~~~~~~~~~~

    Aerostreak, Grappler, Gunatix, Paddletail, Auarious, and Nighteyes had 
been piled on the small raft for days. The ocean was brutal, but finally it 
spit them out the snady beach of the mainland.
    "Ah, this is the mainland!" Aerostreak commented as he got off the raft. 
Following him were the others, and the Maximals in vine chains.
    "Now onto the Predacons! With our Maximal prisoners we will be welcomed 
with open arms!" Gunatix said.
    The six bots began to make the journey to the Predacon base where they 
would help in the battle agianst the Maximals.

    Adrax looked across the vast white strech of the artic. He loved this 
view. And right now nothing in the world could bother him. He was safe, no 
one ever came out here, into the cold, and this lair was amred and a natural 
fortress.
    "I think it would be wise if I were to go to the Predacons and explain 
our stnace in this war." Adrax said to Autofire.
    Autofire had been modifying the wepons all the past week. He wated to be 
ready for a bttle if one occured. "Very well. I will stay here and watch the 
base."
    Adrax nodded, transformed into his demonic beast mode, and took to the 
white sky heading for the Predacon base.
